name: Alice and the Book of Horrors
name_original: Alice and the Book of Horrors
description:
Welcome to Alice and the Book of Horrors. In this little tale, a girl named Alice has been sucked into the Book of Horrors, and must find a way to escape. As the player, your goal is to guide Alice through this cursed book by taking control of a curious little bat. However, the journey will not be easy, for there are horrid creatures which seek to make Alice a part of the book, forever. Each chapter of the book provides different challenges, and you (the bat) must use your wit to help Alice go home, through any means necessary.
